title: cb:틀:SCP 정보상자
content:
[[table class="infobox"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell class="infobox2" colspan="2" style="margin:0; font-size:120%; padding: 0.5em; line-height: 1.75em;"]]
[[div style="float:right; padding-bottom:.15em; padding-right:.15em;" class="scp-list"]]
[[a href="/cb:list-of-scps" title="SCP 목록"]][[image https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/scpcb_gamepedia/thumb/9/9d/Portal.png/20px-Portal.png alt="Portal.png" width="20" height="20"]][[/a]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="margin: 0;"]]
{$name}
[[/div]]
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell colspan="2" style="padding:0.5em; text-align:center;"]] [[image {$image} alt="{$image}" style="width:{$imagewidth}; height:auto;"]] [[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell class="infobox2" colspan="2"]] 정보 [[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width:30%;"]] **등급**[[/cell]]
[[cell style="width:70%;"]] {$class} [[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width:30%;"]] **움직이는가?**[[/cell]]
[[cell style="width:70%;"]] {$animate} [[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell]] **위험한가?** [[/cell]]
[[cell]] {$harmful} [[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell]] **SCP 링크** [[/cell]]
[[cell]] [[a href="/{$scplink}" title="{&name}"]]{$name}[[/a]] [[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[hcell class="infobox2" colspan="2" style="font-size:120%; padding:0.5em;"]] **[[a href="/{$containment}" title="격리구역"]]격리실[[/a]]**[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
author: Dr Devan
